column1:
Helwan university is one of the best rated universities in Egypt , but as any other governmental place it needs more care , bathrooms for example aren't good , the whole university is dusty , you may find music on in the restaurant ( witch ) in there in the middle of the studying day and destructing the students in lectures , also the university needs to provide good transportation inside of it as some colleges are so far from the main door as faculty of Medicine and faculty of Computers & Artificial intelligence .
